column3: Fry all except pecorino and pour 800 ml hot water Simmer for 10-12 Mins Stir pecorino and basil serve with extra drizzle of Oil
Cut bacon in thin Slices Fry with Onion Add Celey & Carrot Prepare tomato sauce and cr�me pour over pasta and cook
Boil spagetti. Melt butter and add tomatoes. Serve spagetti and add sauce.
Boil rice then add butter. Serve after 10 mins.
Prepare the dough with flour and egg and make the phyllo Brush with oil and boil Place layers of dough chese and butter in a tray Cook in oven for an hour
Boil macaroni fry tomatoes and pou over. then sprinkle cheese
